name: DreadSpace
description:
My 2D platformer game for Coursera.

I have added the following elements:

  1. Created 2 additional levels, increasing in diffculty as they go on
  2. New enemy type added, complete with animated states
  3. Overhauled and redesigned the menus, including adding a win screen and the option to choose what level you want to play so you don't have to play all 3 to complete the game
  4. Composed an original soundtrack using GarageBand with original tracks for the main menu and each level
